title: CN Tower
description: The CN Tower is a 553.33 m-high concrete communications and observation tower in downtown Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
address: 301 Front St W, Toronto, ON M5V 2T6

title: Rogers Center
description: Rogers Centre is a multi-purpose stadium in downtown Toronto, Ontario, Canada situated just southwest of the CN Tower near the northern shore of Lake Ontario.
address: 1 Blue Jays Way, Toronto, ON M5V 1J1

title: Royal Ontario Museum
description: The Royal Ontario Museum is a museum of art, world culture and natural history in Toronto, Canada. It is one of the largest museums in North America, the largest in Canada.

title: Art Gallery of Ontario
description: The Art Gallery of Ontario is an art museum in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Its collection includes more than 80,000 works spanning the first century to the present day.
address: 317 Dundas St W, Toronto, ON M5T 1G4

title: Casa Roma
description: Casa Loma is a Gothic Revival style house and gardens in midtown Toronto, Ontario, Canada, that is now a museum and landmark. It was originally a residence for financier Sir Henry Mill Pellatt.
